Workout.no-workouts: You don't have any stored workouts

Alerts.action-description: This action will apply irreversible changes

override-workout.title: Override workout
override-workout.description: This workout already exists. Are you sure you want to override it?

remove-workout.title: Delete workout
remove-workout.description: This action will permanently delete the workout. The exercise records related to this workout will not be deleted.

Errors.workout-not-created: Something went wrong while saving the workout
Errors.workout-not-deleted: Something went wrong while deleting the workout
